etymology.description: 中国 + 美术 + 馆 = China + fine arts + hall/museum → National Art Museum of China.
etymology.interpretation: Proper name of the national-level art museum in Beijing; literally “China art hall.” Commonly abbreviated as 中国美术馆/中國美術館 for the institution.
etymology.simplification: Uses PRC simplifications: 國→国 (enclosed component simplified), 術→术 (stroke reduction), 館→馆 (radical 食→饣), reducing strokes and easing writing.

examples.chinese: 我们明天去中国美术馆参观(我們明天去中國美術館參觀)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen míngtiān qù Zhōngguó Měishùguǎn cānguān.
examples.english: We’re going to visit the National Art Museum of China tomorrow.

examples.chinese: 中国美术馆收藏了大量现代与当代艺术作品(中國美術館收藏了大量現代與當代藝術作品)。
examples.pinyin: Zhōngguó Měishùguǎn shōucáng le dàliàng xiàndài yǔ dāngdài yìshù zuòpǐn.
examples.english: The National Art Museum of China houses a large collection of modern and contemporary artworks.

examples.chinese: 中国美术馆位于北京(中國美術館位於北京)。
examples.english: The National Art Museum of China is located in Beijing.
